channel.title: Yahoo Groups on Shantanu Vs The World
channel.description: Recent content in Yahoo Groups on Shantanu Vs The World

item.title: Gmail Blocking Messages to Yahoo Groups?
item.description: For the past couple of days I have been unable to send any mails to any of my yahoo groups through my gmail account. All my message are returned back with a “Message Rejected” failure. What I get back is a link to this support answer: Sector 5 Bounces. Anyone else seen this?
item.content: For the past couple of days I have been unable to send any mails to any of my yahoo groups through my gmail account. All my message are returned back with a “Message Rejected” failure. What I get back is a link to this support answer: Sector 5 Bounces. Anyone else seen this?
